import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Navbar from './Navbar'; import {TextField,Paper,Button } from '@material-ui/core'; import axios from 'axios' export class Signup extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { allCategories: [], name: "", email: "", password: '', mobile: "", } } onChange = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(this.state) let allData = { name: this.state.name, email: this.state.email, password: this.state.password, mobile: this.state.mobile } axios.post("http://127.0.0.1:5000/signup_user", allData) .then(response => { console.log(response.data) this.props.history.push('/Login') }) .catch(error => { console.log(error) }) } render() { return (

Login here
) } } export default Signup
